table.caption: Simic Assignments
rows: Protect a Simic researcher who is trying to make an exhaustive examination of a new form of plant life.
Capture a previously unknown type of creature.
Contain an ooze or a krasis that is running loose.
Observe the behavior of a new form of krasis or Simic hybrid in the field.
Test a symbiotic magic item or life form (perhaps something like a living {@item cloak of the manta ray}).
Introduce a new predator species to the area to prey on a smaller species that is running amok.
table.name: Simic Character Goals; Simic Assignments
